turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Good afternoon, how can I help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, I'd like to order a drink from a Starbucks in Philadelphia on Walnut Street.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure thing, what would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Looking for a tall caramel macchiato with 2% milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like any whipped cream or syrups?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That sounds good. Let's add some whipped cream on top.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So that's a tall caramel macchiato with 2% milk and whipped cream from the starbucks on wall street in philadelphia right?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great. Your order will be ready in 15 minutes and you'll get the reciept via mobile.
